title: Warehouse Supervisor
description: Description Primary Duties & Responsibilities Receiving Quantity and items are verified against PO and packing list. Material is transferred or issued to the appropriate storage location. Inventory is accurate and verified. Problems are identified and the person responsible is notified to resolve Physical records of received goods are stored digitally. Receipts are entered into ERP system in a timely fashion.
